price: 38. Waa se Allaah, Rabbigay, lana wadaajin maayo cidna Rabbigay cibaadada.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
